Accelerated Control.description: Greatly reduces the cooldowns of crowd control abilities.

Ascension.description: Critical Strikes reduce your ultimate ability's cooldown.

Backup Battery.description: Reanimate temporarily to continue fighting after you die. You also revive faster.

Be Magical.description: Converts bonus Attack Damage into Ability Power.

Be Physical.description: Converts Ability Power into Attack Damage and greatly increases Attack Damage.

Bigger and Bigger.description: When you get a kill, grow in size and permanently gain bonus Health.

Black Hole.description: For a period of time, pull in nearby enemies. The more enemy champions nearby, the more Armor and Magic Resist you gain.

Blade Array.description: Summon a blade array when your ability hits an enemy, dealing your attack's damage and restoring Health.

Bounce, Meow!.description: Projectiles have a chance to ricochet to nearby enemy champions on hit.

Burn, Meow!.description: Enemies affected by the magic circles take damage over time.

Charged Shield.description: Taking damage build energy. At full energy, gain a shield, deal damage, and reset basic ability cooldowns.

Cool Down, Meow!.description: Reduces the cooldowns of all projectile abilities.

Cursed Blight.description: On hit, your attacks and abilities slow the target and reduce Attack Speed. After collecting 4 Forbidden Augments, you'll be credited for all enemy champion kills.

Dangerous Footwork.description: Your attacks fire missiles at nearby enemies. Missiles apply on-hit effects.

Dashing.description: Reduces the cooldowns of movement abilities.

Dive Bomber.description: Deal high damage to nearby enemies upon death. You also revive faster.

Dual Wield.description: Reduces Attack Damage and Ability Power in exchange for a great Attack Speed boost.

Escape Artist.description: Taking damage reduces the cooldowns of your movement abilities.

Eureka.description: Gain Ability Haste based on your Attack Damage and Ability Power.

Executioner.description: Refreshes basic ability cooldowns when you get a kill.

Forbidden Bliss.description: Gain Omnivamp. After collecting 4 Forbidden Augments, you'll be credited for all enemy champion kills.

Forbidden Evil.description: Your abilities grant permanent Adaptive Force on hit. After collecting 4 Forbidden Augments, you'll be credited for all enemy champion kills.

Forbidden Rage.description: Greatly increases Critical Damage, true damage, and damage over time. After collecting 4 Forbidden Augments, you'll be credited for all enemy champion kills.

Fury.description: Grow in size and gain Armor and Resist after taking damage.

Giant's Adversary.description: The smaller your size, the higher your damage. Enlargement effects gained make you shrink instead.

Health Marker.description: Your abilities mark enemies on hit. Attacking marked enemies restores Health.

Heartsong Blade.description: Spellblade: After granting allies a bonus, your next attack deals additional damage.

Heartsong Conversion.description: The higher your Heal and Shield Power, the higher your Ability Haste.

Heartsong Restoration.description: Greatly increases Heal and Shield Power and reduces ability cost.

Heartsong Speed.description: Increases Heal and Shield Power. The higher your Heal and Shield Power, the faster you are.

Hi-Precision Sharpshooter.description: Hitting an enemy with an ability at long range reduces the cooldowns of this ability and your ultimate ability.

Imprisoning Chain.description: When you crowd control an enemy, fire a chain that deals damage over time. If they break free, pull them back to you.

Kaboom, Meow!.description: Build up Energy stacks when dealing damage. At full stacks, summon a magic circle that rains down bombs.

Kinetic Cooldown.description: Moving reduces your basic ability cooldowns.

Late-Game Carry.description: Earn gold continuously. The more gold you have, the higher your damage.

Leviathan.description: The larger your size, the higher your damage. Shrinkage effects gained make you big instead.

Lightning Equipment.description: Dealing damage with items calls down lightning that slows enemies.

Lion's Spellblade.description: After hitting a target with an ability, your next attack summons a clone that attacks.

Lord of Spellblade.description: Attacks have a 75% chance to reduce all of Spellblade's effect cooldowns.

Lunar Eclipse.description: The higher your Attack Speed, the higher your Physical Vamp.

Lupine Miasma.description: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack creates a Lupine Miasma domain that grants you invisibility while you're within it.

Lupine Soul.description: Summon a Lupine Soul when dashing. Lupine Soul triggers the effects of Shadow Wolf Augments.

Mad Scientist.description: Reduces your size and greatly increases your Movement Speed and Ability Haste.

Master of Duality.description: Gain Ability Power when you hit an enemy with an attack and Attack Damage when you hit them with an ability.

Master of Mobility.description: Gain a large amount of Ability Haste for movement abilities. Basic abilities are treated as movement abilities.

Master Thief.description: Enhances all stealing effects and grants Omnivamp.

Melee Shield.description: Gain a shield when you hit an enemy at close range. (10s cooldown per enemy)

Mind to Matter.description: The higher your Mana, the higher your Health.

Movement Speed Enhancement.description: The higher your Movement Speed, the higher your damage and Heal and Shield Power.

Nebula Rift.description: Grow in size. When taking damage, you have a chance to steal Health and Movement Speed from nearby enemies.

Nowhere to Run, Meow!.description: Your magic circles and traps will shift over time.

Piercing Feathers.description: Your Critical Strikes fire missiles at the target.

Piercing Spellblade.description: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack deals damage over time to enemies in an area and reduces their Armor and Magic Resist.

Pinnacle of Perfection.description: Critical Rate is capped at 25%. Excess Critical Rate is converted into high Critical Strike Damage.

Plaguebrand.description: Your attacks mark enemies. At 5 stacks, deal damage in an area, slow enemies, and spread the mark.

Proximal Storm.description: Your ability damage and heals can Critically Strike. Gain 15% Critical Rate.

Resolve.description: Quickly restore a large amount of Health when your Health is low. (Cooldown is reduced whenever you apply a crowd control effect.)

Slow Detonation.description: When slowing an enemy, deal damage to enemies nearby.

Smaller and Smaller.description: When you get a kill, shrink in size and permanently gain Movement Speed.

Soulhunter's Chain.description: Your abilities mark enemies on hit. Your attacks damage marked enemies.

Speed Thief.description: Gain Movement Speed when you slow enemies.

Speed Up, Meow!.description: Greatly increases the speed and damage of projectiles.

Spellblade Combo.description: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack strikes twice.

Splintered Chakrams.description: Your attacks store Wing Blades. Hitting an enemy with an ability fires them. At max stacks, attacks also fire Wing Blades.

Stack 'em Mana.description: You can have more than one item from the Tear of the Goddess series in your inventory.

Stack Assault.description: The more attacks you hit an enemy champion with, the higher the damage of your attacks against them.

Starlight Cross.description: On hit, your attacks and abilities deal damage in an area. The higher your Mana, the higher the damage.

Stealth Mode.description: Become invisible after using a movement ability.

Stroke of Luck.description: Increases Critical Rate by 50% and greatly increases your luck.

Suppressive Vambrace.description: Applying crowd control effects grants stacking Armor and Magic Resist.

Swift and Safe.description: Gain a shield after using a movement ability.

Tectonic Rift.description: Using movement abilities summons an explosive crack along your path, stealing the enemy's Movement Speed.

Thief's Circle.description: Applying crowd control steals the affected enemy's size, Armor, and Magic Resist, and deals damage.

Truce Shield.description: Gain a shield upon leaving combat. The higher your Adaptive Force, the more damage the shield absorbs.

Twice Thrice.description: Your attacks have a chance of striking twice.

Typhoon.description: Your attacks call down lightning bolts and apply on-hits.

Unstoppable Surge.description: Spellblade: After using an ability, your next attack deals damage in an area and grants Armor and Magic Resist.

Virtuous Cycle.description: Healing grants a shield, and a shield grants healing.

Vulnerability.description: [Critical Strike] Your item damage and your abilities' damage over time effects can Critically Strike. Gain 25% Critical Rate.

Whale.description: You can buy items anytime and gain access to unique items.

Windwalk.description: Gain Movement Speed when you heal or shield a target.
